.class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit EventBuilder extends System.Object
.class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit EventBuilder extends System.Object implements class System.Runtime.InteropServices._EventBuilder

remarks.format: ## Remarks An `EventBuilder` is always associated with a `TypeBuilder`. The TypeBuilder.DefineEvent method will return a new `EventBuilder` to a client.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void AddOtherMethod(class System.Reflection.Emit.MethodBuilder mdBuilder) cil managed

Docs.param: A object that represents the other method.
Docs.summary: Adds one of the "other" methods associated with this event. "Other" methods are methods other than the "on" and "raise" methods associated with an event. This function can be called many times to add as many "other" methods.
Docs.exception: has been called on the enclosing type.

Protected MustOverride Sub AddOtherMethodCore (mdBuilder As MethodBuilder)

Docs.param: A object that represents the other method.
Docs.summary: When overridden in a derived class, adds one of the "other" methods associated with this event.
Docs.remarks: "Other" methods are methods other than the "on" and "raise" methods associated with an event. This function can be called multiple times to add additional "other" methods.

Docs.param: Reserved for future use. Must be IID_NULL.
Passed-in array of names to be mapped.
Count of the names to be mapped.
The locale context in which to interpret the names.

remarks.format: ## Remarks This method is for access to managed classes from unmanaged code, and should not be called from managed code. For more information, see [IDispatch::GetIDsOfNames](/windows/win32/api/oaidl/nf-oaidl-idispatch-getidsofnames).

Docs.exception: The method is called late-bound using the COM IDispatch interface.
